body: Why is the second part not here?
Would have been amazing if the tall dude didn't exist.  Ending ruined it.
@Original_Katsu_Don the only "nice" wrap up would be tall chick got knocked up by tall dude, but no one stays with her and short dude finds an actually good girl

Fuck... Great till the fucking mmf bs how the fuck do you call this wholesome? She wants to fuck another dude cause her bf aint good enough? And before you say "oh but the sister" he had no say in that either . and you have the dude cum inside? The fuck? Short dude deserves so much better, same with other dudes gf

Absolutely brilliant. Super wholesome love story between a short guy, and a tall girl. Pertty much every fetish tag is encompassed, and pretty much all of human desires within a relationship are laid bare within this construct. This is one of my favorite dojins, @HgaLover part two exists, and is a nice wrap up.
an all time favorite. I wonder if there is chapter 2 on here..

@Ravenleaf you're dead to me.

to start with this is missing a FUCKTON of tags secondly this is pure fucking garbage in every way possible swinging trash, i despise garbage like this in every way i possible can, i almost puked thank fuck i only looked through the gallery, one is a whore whos boyfriend is completely fine with letting someone else fuck his gf, cuck, the other is another whore who to begin with has a boyfriend that dosent give a fuck about her feelings and just lets her get tied up while he fucks his gfs sister, and then lets her get fucked by another guy anyway, cuck, and his gf instantly wants to just get fucked anyway, fuck this garbage author and this garbage work

Did Takemura Sesshu ever do any other books with an actual story? Take on me volume 1 + 2 are masterpieces, but this was 10 years ago. All I've ever seen from him in the past are doujins about Idol Master and more recently this Kantai Collection stuff. I mean, they are still awesome, but they are basically just fan fics, nothing like this.
I wish this was an OVA.
Know what annoys me is part of the beginning is out of order in every translation I find.

I have very mixed feelings with this one, although it's really good the last scene just killed it for me. Same with welcome to tokoharu apartments by kisaragi gunma, I have nothing against polygamous relationships but when someone outside of it enters, that's what kills it for me.. sigh could've been much better without the last part.. Note that this is a SUBJECTIVE comment, that means it's based on my thoughts and experience about the comic.
@jedavi01 You shouldn't be here kiddo, go home.
